The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 26 August is 284,155 (504.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 August, there were 6,326 new confirmed cases (11.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 August, there were 6,899 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 8% (573 fewer cases).
